<!-- Please use this template while reporting a bug and provide as much info as possible. Not doing so may result in your bug not being addressed in a timely manner. Thanks!-->


**What happened**: Cloud Controller Manager for Azure did not delete Scale Set instance from the cluster after being removed by Cluster Autoscaler 

**What you expected to happen**: The removal of the Scale Set instance from the cluster 

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**: Create a Kubernetes cluster in Azure, scale the cluster up with an instance from a VMSS, remove the instance from the VMSS, and the node should still be registered and present in the cluster

**Anything else we need to know?**:
I believe this is being caused by an error being returned [when checking for an existing VMSS instance 
that doesn't exist in Azure](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/60339ed370633895078d3574518a664231a39b75/pkg/cloudprovider/providers/azure/azure_vmss.go#L163) and the [logic in the node controller](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/60339ed370633895078d3574518a664231a39b75/pkg/controller/cloud/node_controller.go#L274)

See the following logs

```sh
I1130 11:30:07.429908       1 azure_vmss_cache.go:198] Virtual machine scale set VM "my-rg#general-pool-00_3" not found with message: "compute.VirtualMachineScaleSetVMsClient#Get: Failure responding to request: StatusCode=404 -- Original Error: autorest/azure: Service returned an error. Status=404 Code=\"NotFound\" Message=\"The entity was not found.\""
E1130 11:30:07.430071       1 azure_vmss.go:162] cound't find vmss virtual machine by scaleSetName ("general-pool-00") and instanceID ("3")
E1130 11:30:07.430152       1 node_controller.go:276] Error checking if node general-pool-00000003 exists: instance not found
```

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`): 
```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"12", GitVersion:"v1.12.1", GitCommit:"4ed3216f3ec431b140b1d899130a69fc671678f4", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-10-05T16:46:06Z", GoVersion:"go1.10.4", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"12", GitVersion:"v1.12.2", GitCommit:"17c77c7898218073f14c8d573582e8d2313dc740", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-10-24T06:43:59Z", GoVersion:"go1.10.4", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration: Azure
